question: List all driver names.
sql: SELECT forename surname AS name FROM drivers;
cypher: MATCH (d:drivers) RETURN d.forename surname AS name;

question: Show all circuit names.
sql: SELECT name FROM circuits;
cypher: MATCH (c:circuits) RETURN c.name;

question: Get the names of all constructors.
sql: SELECT name FROM constructors;
cypher: MATCH (c:constructors) RETURN c.name;

question: Find the number of races held in 2010.
sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM races WHERE year = 2010;
cypher: MATCH (r:races) WHERE r.year = 2010 RETURN count(r);

question: Which driver won the 2008 British Grand Prix?
sql: SELECT d.forename d.surname FROM results r JOIN races ra ON r.raceId = ra.raceId JOIN drivers d ON r.driverId = d.driverId WHERE ra.year = 2008 AND ra.name = 'British Grand Prix' AND r.position = 1;
cypher: MATCH (r:results)-[:IN_RACE]->(ra:races), (d:drivers) WHERE r.raceId = ra.raceId AND r.driverId = d.driverId AND ra.year = 2008 AND ra.name = 'British Grand Prix' AND r.position = 1 RETURN d.forename, d.surname;

question: Show the circuit name for the 2019 Monaco Grand Prix.
sql: SELECT c.name FROM races r JOIN circuits c ON r.circuitId = c.circuitId WHERE r.year = 2019 AND r.name = 'Monaco Grand Prix';
cypher: MATCH (r:races)-[:HELD_AT]->(c:circuits) WHERE r.circuitId = c.circuitId AND r.year = 2019 AND r.name = 'Monaco Grand Prix' RETURN c.name;

question: List all years when the Italian Grand Prix was held.
sql: SELECT year FROM races WHERE name = 'Italian Grand Prix' ORDER BY year;
cypher: MATCH (r:races) WHERE r.name = 'Italian Grand Prix' RETURN r.year ORDER BY r.year;

question: Get the total number of drivers in the database.
sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM drivers;
cypher: MATCH (d:drivers) RETURN count(d);

question: Find the nationality of the constructor named 'Ferrari'.
sql: SELECT nationality FROM constructors WHERE name = 'Ferrari';
cypher: MATCH (c:constructors) WHERE c.name = 'Ferrari' RETURN c.nationality;

question: Show all race names in the 2020 season.
sql: SELECT name FROM races WHERE year = 2020;
cypher: MATCH (r:races) WHERE r.year = 2020 RETURN r.name;

question: List all driver nationalities.
sql: SELECT DISTINCT nationality FROM drivers;
cypher: MATCH (d:drivers) RETURN DISTINCT d.nationality;

question: Show all constructor nationalities.
sql: SELECT DISTINCT nationality FROM constructors;
cypher: MATCH (c:constructors) RETURN DISTINCT c.nationality;

question: Get the number of circuits in the database.
sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM circuits;
cypher: MATCH (c:circuits) RETURN count(c);

question: Show the name of the circuit located in Monza.
sql: SELECT name FROM circuits WHERE location = 'Monza';
cypher: MATCH (c:circuits) WHERE c.location = 'Monza' RETURN c.name;

question: List all race years available in the database.
sql: SELECT DISTINCT year FROM races ORDER BY year;
cypher: MATCH (r:races) RETURN DISTINCT r.year ORDER BY r.year;

question: Find the driver with driverId = 1.
sql: SELECT forename, surname FROM drivers WHERE driverId = 1;
cypher: MATCH (d:drivers) WHERE d.driverId = 1 RETURN d.forename, d.surname;

question: Show all race names held in 2015.
sql: SELECT name FROM races WHERE year = 2015;
cypher: MATCH (r:races) WHERE r.year = 2015 RETURN r.name;

sql: SELECT name FROM circuits WHERE country = 'Italy';
cypher: MATCH (c:circuits) WHERE c.country = 'Italy' RETURN c.name;

question: How many races were held in 2000?
sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM races WHERE year = 2000;
cypher: MATCH (r:races) WHERE r.year = 2000 RETURN count(r);

sql: SELECT surname FROM drivers WHERE nationality = 'German';
cypher: MATCH (d:drivers) WHERE d.nationality = 'German' RETURN d.surname;

question: List the names of constructors from the UK.
sql: SELECT name FROM constructors WHERE nationality = 'British';
cypher: MATCH (c:constructors) WHERE c.nationality = 'British' RETURN c.name;

question: Get the year and name of the first race in the database.
sql: SELECT year, name FROM races ORDER BY year ASC, round ASC LIMIT 1;
cypher: MATCH (r:races) RETURN r.year, r.name ORDER BY r.year, r.round

question: Show all drivers born in 1980.
sql: SELECT forename, surname FROM drivers WHERE dob LIKE '1980%';
cypher: MATCH (d:drivers) WHERE dob LIKE '1980' RETURN d.forename, d.surname;

question: Get the total number of constructors.
sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM constructors;
cypher: MATCH (c:constructors) RETURN count(c);

cypher: MATCH (c:circuits) WHERE c.country = 'Japan' RETURN c.name;

sql: SELECT name FROM races WHERE year = 2021 AND round = 1;
cypher: MATCH (r:races) WHERE r.year = 2021 AND r.round = 1 RETURN r.name;

question: Get the total number of races in 2021.
sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM races WHERE year = 2021;
cypher: MATCH (r:races) WHERE r.year = 2021 RETURN count(r);

question: Show all unique countries where circuits are located.
sql: SELECT DISTINCT country FROM circuits;
cypher: MATCH (c:circuits) RETURN c.DISTINCT, c.country;

question: List all drivers with surname 'Hamilton'.
sql: SELECT forename, surname FROM drivers WHERE surname = 'Hamilton';
cypher: MATCH (d:drivers) WHERE d.surname = 'Hamilton' RETURN d.forename, d.surname;

question: Get the birthdate of Lewis Hamilton.
sql: SELECT dob FROM drivers WHERE surname = 'Hamilton' AND forename = 'Lewis';
cypher: MATCH (d:drivers) WHERE d.surname = 'Hamilton' AND d.forename = 'Lewis' RETURN d.dob;

sql: SELECT name FROM constructors WHERE name LIKE '%Mercedes%';
cypher: MATCH (c:constructors) WHERE c.name CONTAINS 'Mercedes' RETURN c.name;

sql: SELECT name FROM races WHERE year = 1999;

sql: SELECT nationality FROM drivers WHERE forename = 'Michael' AND surname = 'Schumacher';
cypher: MATCH (d:drivers) WHERE d.forename = 'Michael' AND d.surname = 'Schumacher' RETURN d.nationality;

sql: SELECT name FROM circuits WHERE country = 'UK';
cypher: MATCH (c:circuits) WHERE c.country = 'UK' RETURN c.name;

question: Find all races held at Silverstone.
sql: SELECT year, name FROM races r JOIN circuits c ON r.circuitId = c.circuitId WHERE c.name = 'Silverstone';
cypher: MATCH (r:races)-[:HELD_AT]->(c:circuits) WHERE r.circuitId = c.circuitId AND c.name = 'Silverstone' RETURN r.year, r.name;

question: Get the number of German drivers.
sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM drivers WHERE nationality = 'German';
cypher: MATCH (d:drivers) WHERE d.nationality = 'German' RETURN count(d);

question: Show all race winners in 2019.
sql: SELECT ra.name, d.forename, d.surname FROM results r JOIN races ra ON r.raceId = ra.raceId JOIN drivers d ON r.driverId = d.driverId WHERE ra.year = 2019 AND r.position = 1;
cypher: MATCH (r:results)-[:IN_RACE]->(ra:races), (d:drivers) WHERE r.raceId = ra.raceId AND r.driverId = d.driverId AND ra.year = 2019 AND r.position = 1 RETURN ra.name, d.forename, d.surname;

sql: SELECT DISTINCT c.name FROM results r JOIN races ra ON r.raceId = ra.raceId JOIN constructors c ON r.constructorId = c.constructorId WHERE ra.year = 2005;
cypher: MATCH (r:results)-[:IN_RACE]->(ra:races), (c:constructors) WHERE r.raceId = ra.raceId AND r.constructorId = c.constructorId AND ra.year = 2005 RETURN DISTINCT c.name;

sql: SELECT ra.year, d.forename, d.surname FROM results r JOIN races ra ON r.raceId = ra.raceId JOIN drivers d ON r.driverId = d.driverId WHERE ra.name = 'Monaco Grand Prix' AND r.position = 1 ORDER BY ra.year;
cypher: MATCH (r:results)-[:IN_RACE]->(ra:races), (d:drivers) WHERE r.raceId = ra.raceId AND r.driverId = d.driverId AND ra.name = 'Monaco Grand Prix' AND r.position = 1 RETURN ra.year, d.forename, d.surname ORDER BY ra.year;

question: Show the winners of the Italian Grand Prix in the 2000s.
sql: SELECT ra.year, d.forename, d.surname FROM results r JOIN races ra ON r.raceId = ra.raceId JOIN drivers d ON r.driverId = d.driverId WHERE ra.name = 'Italian Grand Prix' AND ra.year BETWEEN 2000 AND 2009 AND r.position = 1;
cypher: MATCH (r:results)-[:IN_RACE]->(ra:races), (d:drivers) WHERE r.raceId = ra.raceId AND r.driverId = d.driverId AND ra.name = 'Italian Grand Prix' AND ra.year >= 2000 AND ra.year <= 2009 AND r.position = 1 RETURN ra.year, d.forename, d.surname;

question: Show the winners of the Australian Grand Prix across all years.
sql: SELECT ra.year, d.forename, d.surname FROM results r JOIN races ra ON r.raceId = ra.raceId JOIN drivers d ON r.driverId = d.driverId WHERE ra.name = 'Australian Grand Prix' AND r.position = 1 ORDER BY ra.year;
cypher: MATCH (r:results)-[:IN_RACE]->(ra:races), (d:drivers) WHERE r.raceId = ra.raceId AND r.driverId = d.driverId AND ra.name = 'Australian Grand Prix' AND r.position = 1 RETURN ra.year, d.forename, d.surname ORDER BY ra.year;

question: List all drivers born in the UK.
sql: SELECT forename, surname, dob FROM drivers WHERE nationality = 'British';
cypher: MATCH (d:drivers) WHERE d.nationality = 'British' RETURN d.forename, d.surname, d.dob;

question: Show constructors with nationality 'Russian'.
sql: SELECT name FROM constructors WHERE nationality = 'Russian';
cypher: MATCH (c:constructors) WHERE c.nationality = 'Russian' RETURN c.name;

question: Get the total number of races in Spain.
sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM races r JOIN circuits c ON r.circuitId = c.circuitId WHERE c.country = 'Spain';
cypher: MATCH (r:races)-[:HELD_AT]->(c:circuits) WHERE r.circuitId = c.circuitId AND c.country = 'Spain' RETURN count(r);

question: Find the winner of the 2016 Monaco Grand Prix.
sql: SELECT d.forename, d.surname FROM results r JOIN races ra ON r.raceId = ra.raceId JOIN drivers d ON r.driverId = d.driverId WHERE ra.year = 2016 AND ra.name = 'Monaco Grand Prix' AND r.position = 1;
cypher: MATCH (r:results)-[:IN_RACE]->(ra:races), (d:drivers) WHERE r.raceId = ra.raceId AND r.driverId = d.driverId AND ra.year = 2016 AND ra.name = 'Monaco Grand Prix' AND r.position = 1 RETURN d.forename, d.surname;

question: List the names of all circuits in South America.
sql: SELECT name FROM circuits WHERE continent = 'South America';
cypher: MATCH (c:circuits) WHERE c.continent = 'South America' RETURN c.name;

question: Show the drivers who won races in 2012.
sql: SELECT DISTINCT d.forename, d.surname FROM results r JOIN races ra ON r.raceId = ra.raceId JOIN drivers d ON r.driverId = d.driverId WHERE ra.year = 2012 AND r.position = 1;
cypher: MATCH (r:results)-[:IN_RACE]->(ra:races), (d:drivers) WHERE r.raceId = ra.raceId AND r.driverId = d.driverId AND ra.year = 2012 AND r.position = 1 RETURN DISTINCT d.forename, d.surname;

question: Get the number of constructors from Italy.
sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM constructors WHERE nationality = 'Italian';
cypher: MATCH (c:constructors) WHERE c.nationality = 'Italian' RETURN count(c);

question: Find the winners of the Singapore Grand Prix.
sql: SELECT ra.year, d.forename, d.surname FROM results r JOIN races ra ON r.raceId = ra.raceId JOIN drivers d ON r.driverId = d.driverId WHERE ra.name = 'Singapore Grand Prix' AND r.position = 1 ORDER BY ra.year;
cypher: MATCH (r:results)-[:IN_RACE]->(ra:races), (d:drivers) WHERE r.raceId = ra.raceId AND r.driverId = d.driverId AND ra.name = 'Singapore Grand Prix' AND r.position = 1 RETURN ra.year, d.forename, d.surname ORDER BY ra.year;

question: Show all drivers from Japan.
sql: SELECT forename, surname FROM drivers WHERE nationality = 'Japanese';
cypher: MATCH (d:drivers) WHERE d.nationality = 'Japanese' RETURN d.forename, d.surname;
